title: Someone says "synergy" unironically in the All-Hands
description: Must be audible to at least 50 people. Bonus -2000 points if said by C-level.

title: HR sends a wellness email the same week layoffs are announced
description: Screenshot required. Double points if it mentions "resilience".

title: A manager uses the phrase "do more with less" in 1:1
Fire alarm goes off and nobody leaves their desk
description: Video evidence mandatory. Bonus if someone yells "It's just a drill!".

title: Someone cries in the bathroom (caught on audio)
The coffee machine dies permanently
description: Must remain broken >5 business days. Funeral service encouraged.

title: CEO posts LinkedIn thought-leadership about "work-life balance"
description: While simultaneously sending 10pm emails. Screenshot combo = 1.5x multiplier.

title: Mandatory fun team-building event announced
description: Extra -3000 if it's trust falls or escape room.

title: Someone gets promoted who started after you
IT sends company-wide email about phishing... that is itself a phishing test
The office plants finally die from neglect
A senior leader says "We're a family" right before RIF
description: Highest single payout event of Q4.

title: Someone brings a baby to "Take Your Child to Work Day" and it screams through a client call
The intern is asked to book the holiday party at the same venue as last year's layoffs
The thermostat war reaches actual physical sabotage
description: Evidence of tampering required. No injuries.
